users:
  - name: root
    lock_passwd: false
    ssh_authorized_keys:
      - {{ .PublicKey }}
{{- if .RootPasswordHash }}
    hashed_passwd: {{ .RootPasswordHash }}
{{- end }}
package_update: true
write_files:
  - content: |
{{ .NodeadmConfigYaml | indent 6 }}
    path: nodeadm-config.yaml
{{ range $file := .Files }}
  - content: |
{{ $file.Content | indent 6 }}
    path: {{ $file.Path }}
{{if $file.Permissions}}
    permissions: '{{ $file.Permissions }}'
{{- end }}
{{- end }}

runcmd:
  # Install Lustre client for FSx CSI driver support (Ubuntu 20.04 specific)
  - |
    apt-get update || true
    apt-get install -y linux-headers-$(uname -r) build-essential || true
    apt-get install -y lustre-client-modules-$(uname -r) || apt-get install -y lustre-client-modules-generic || true
    apt-get install -y lustre-client-utils || true
    depmod -a
    modprobe lnet || true
    modprobe lustre || true
  - /tmp/nodeadm-init.sh "{{ .NodeadmUrl }}" "{{ .KubernetesVersion }}" "{{ .Provider }}" "{{ .Region }}" "{{ .NodeadmAdditionalArgs }}"
  - /tmp/nvidia-driver-install.sh

final_message: "The system is prepped, after $UPTIME seconds"
